name: Disneyland
description: The Happiest Place on Earth

rides.name: Gadget's Go Coaster
description: This is a is a junior roller coaster based on the work of the
character Gadget Hackwrench from Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers.
The Go Coaster is primarily for children and therefore has very
small cars. While two children can easily fit into a single car,
most adults would have to travel alone (or with a small child).

rides.name: Car Toon Spin
description: This is a dark ride inspired by Who Framed Roger Rabbit.
Each cab seats two people, and can spin around, much like
Fantasyland's Mad Tea Party.
tips: This FP is often disconnected from others.
Try to figure out the license plates at the start of the queue.

rides.name: Buzz Lightyear Astro Blasters
description: This is a combination of a shooting gallery and a dark ride
based on Toy Story 2.
Pistols are used to shoot laser beams at targets of varying point values.
tips: If the ride stops, keep shooting.
Round targets are 100 points, square are 1,000 points, diamond are 5,000 points, and triangle are 10,000 points.
Look for hidden targets in dark areas and on the figures.

rides.name: Astro Orbiter
description: This is a is a rocket-spinner attraction.
Two riders can fit in each vehicle.

rides.name: Finding Nemo Submarines
description: This is a submarine ride based on Finding Nemo.
Guests see a giant sea bass, a seaweed forest, the ruins of an ancient
civilization, a gigantic tiki head, giant clams, sharks, whales, and
a deep sea volcanic eruption.

rides.name: Autopia
description: In this attaction, patrons steer specially designed cars through an
enclosed track.
Two people can ride per car.

rides.name: Star Tours
description: This is a 3D motion simulator attraction based on the Star Wars films.
Guests take a turbulent excursion trip across the galaxy, as droids C-3PO
and R2-D2 attempt to safely return a rebel spy to the Rebel Alliance.
The ride sequence is randomized.  When combined, they allow 54 different
possible ride experiences.

rides.name: Space Mountain
description: Space Mountain is a space-themed indoor steel roller coaster.
Every September during Halloween Time at Disneyland, the dome is given
projections for the Ghost Galaxy event.

rides.name: King Arthur Carrousel
description: King Arthur Carrousel is the carousel in Fantasyland at
Disneyland which was featured in the telecast of Disneyland's
1955 opening day.
It has 68 white horses arranged in four courses.
tips: The carousel was originally built in 1875 and has been repeatedly modified.
All the horses have been white since 1975.
Each horse has a name; a complete list is available at City Hall.
A Wurlitzer #157 Band Organ face decorates the carousel, but does not operate.

rides.name: Storybook Canal Boats
description: Passengers embark on a leisurely-paced outdoor boat ride through
a winding canal featuring settings from Disney animated films
recreated in miniature.

rides.name: Casey Jr Circus Train
description: Based on the train of the same name from the 1941 film Dumbo,
it gives passengers a tour of many miniature versions of classic
Disney animated film scenes.

rides.name: Mr. Toad's Wild Ride
description: The dark ride's story is based on Disney's adaptation of The Wind
in the Willows.
Each car seats two people.

rides.name: Mad Tea Party
description: This is a spinning tea cup ride inspired by the Unbirthday Party
scene in Walt Disney's Alice In Wonderland.
The ride has three small turntables, which rotate clockwise, each
holding six teacups, within one large turntable, rotating
counter-clockwise.

rides.name: Dumbo
description: This is an aerial carousel-style ride based on the movie Dumbo.
The passengers ride in one of 16 Dumbo cars and can maneuver them up
and down with a joystick that operates a hydraulic ram. The ride itself
rotates counterclockwise at a constant rate.

rides.name: Snow White's Scary Adv.
description: This is a dark ride based on the Snow White film.
The ride vehicles seat 4-6 people and resemble the beds of the Seven
Dwarfs and feature the names of each dwarf, much like their beds in
the film.

rides.name: Pinocchio's Daring Journey
description: This is a dark ride based on the classic tale.

rides.name: Alice in Wonderland
description: This is a dark ride based on the film Alice in Wonderland.
Guests ride in caterpillar vehicles down the rabbit hole.
In 2014 many scenes were updated with digitally projected images
and effects.

rides.name: it's a small world
description: This boat ride features over 300 brightly costumed audio-animatronic
dolls in the style of children of the world, frolicking in a spirit of
international unity and singing the attraction's title song, which has a
theme of global peace.

rides.name: Peter Pan's Flight
description: This is a suspended dark ride based on Walt Disney's Peter Pan.
Guests fly over the rooftops of London, and view audio-animatronic
versions of the characters from the story.

rides.name: Matterhorn Bobsleds
description: The Matterhorn Bobsleds is composed of two intertwining steel roller
coasters.  It is modeled after the Matterhorn, a mountain in the
Swiss Alps.
It is the first tubular steel continuous track roller coaster ever constructed.

rides.name: Jungle Cruise
description: The attraction simulates a riverboat cruise down several major
rivers of Asia, Africa and South America.
Park guests board
replica tramp steamers from a 1930s British explorers' lodge
and are taken on a voyage past many different Audio-Animatronic
jungle animals. The tour is led by a live Disney cast member
delivering a humorous narration.

rides.name: Indiana Jones
description: This is an enhanced motion vehicle dark ride attraction based
on the Indiana Jones film series. Guests accompany intrepid
archaeologist Dr. Indiana Jones on a turbulent quest, aboard
military troop transport vehicles, through a dangerous lost
temple guarded by a supernatural power.

rides.name: Big Thunder Mountain
description: This is an indoor/outdoor mine train roller coaster.  Gold
was discovered near the town of Rainbow Ridge, and an
extensive line of mine trains was set up to transport the
ore.  Eventually, the town was abandoned.  Some time later,
the locomotives were found to be racing around the mountain on
their own, without engineers or a crew
In 2014, the ride was refurbished with a new track, trains,
scenery, and new ending featuring special effects such as
projection mapping and smoke effects.

rides.name: Winnie the Pooh
description: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh is a dark ride based upon
the film The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh, itself based on
the Winnie-the-Pooh books by A. A. Milne.
Guests ride in a honeypot through a rain storm, dream sequence,
Pooh's birthday party.

rides.name: Canoes
description: Davy Crockett Explorer Canoes is a free-floating canoe experience.
Up to twenty visitors paddle a canoe around the Rivers of America,
accompanied by two guides. This is the only Disneyland attraction that
is powered by park visitors.

rides.name: Pirates of the Caribbean
description: Pirates of the Caribbean is a dark boat ride which tells the
story of a band of pirates including their troubles and their
exploits.  The films are based on the ride, and the ride was updated
in 2006 to include the Jack Sparrow character.
Guests may get slightly wet.  There are two drops.

rides.name: Haunted Mansion
description: The Haunted Mansion is a haunted house dark ride.  The Haunted
Mansion features a ride-through tour in Omnimover vehicles called
"Doom Buggies," preceded by a walk-through show in the queue.
The attraction utilizes a range of technology, from centuries-old
theatrical effects to modern special effects and spectral
Audio-Animatronics.
tips: At Christmastime, the ride has a seasonal overlay featuring characters from the 1993 film The Nightmare Before Christmas.

rides.name: Splash Mountain
description: Splash Mountain is a log flume-style dark ride based on the
characters, stories, and songs from the 1946 Disney film Song
of the South.
The ride begins with a peaceful outdoor float-through that leads
to indoor dark ride segments, with a climactic steep drop into a
"briar patch" followed by an indoor finale. The drop is 53 feet.
